text: @GavinNewsom @CDC says at-risk Americans should #StayAtHome. Employers, among them firms that staff federal agencies, have begun to demand that those working at home return to work — even if they share a household/or are at risk! WHERE are employer guidelines regarding #COVID19 accommodation?
